translations: n.领港；近岸航行法；地标领航；半工厂性检查
v.驾驶（pilot 的 ing 形式）；领航

phrs.translation: 试点项目，试点工程；样板工程，样板设计
n. 初步研究；预备试验；飞行员研究
n. 试验工场；小规模试验厂
试点计划，试点工程；实验计画
长明小灯；常燃小火；标灯（等于pilot lamp）

sentences.sentence: Teachers are piloting a literature-based reading programme.
sentences.translation: 老师们正在试开一门以文学为基础的阅读课程。

sentences.sentence: This means piloting stints of some four to five days at a time.
sentences.translation: 这意味着每次飞行要限制在4到5天里。

sentences.sentence: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.translation: 他们最近还在实施另两个旨在让家庭走向户外的项目。
